DOC.brief_summary: The mood influence many factor child . Sport , high-altitude mountain trek activity think benefit human 's mood health . The expedition therapy popular many school recently . However , investigator best knowledge , article discus relation mood high-altitude mountain trek activity benefit influence child . So , investigator conduct study . Method : Demographic data record . The Professor Yeh 's mood questionnaire use record mood status 3 day high-altitude mountain trek activity . Statistical analysis : Participants rat emotional state ( happiness , sadness , anticipation , anger ) Likert scale . Each variable present descriptive statistic . Student test suitable statistical method ( ) use determine correction among variable score mood status . The paired test suitable statistical method ( ) use determine correction among score mood status mountain activity . A difference consider statistically significant p value less 0.05 . All statistical analysis perform use SPPS statistical software Windows , version 14 updated version .
